definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
to add or subtract/to increase or decrease/to go up or go down

sentences.english: I need to get back in shape.
sentences.chinese: 我要减回到原来的身材。

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被从死刑减为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行动导致被判处死刑，后来减为有期徒刑。

sentences.english: You need to exercise and lose some weight.
Healthy eating helps to reduce your blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 健康口腹能帮忙减低血糖。

sentences.english: With the increase of tree age, the nutrient resorption efficiency and proficiency increased first and declined then.
sentences.chinese: 养分再吸收效率和转移度均随林龄先增后减。

sentences.english: Feed-water and anti-surge devices are also used in power stations.
sentences.chinese: 电厂也要使用给水和减纵荡装置。

sentences.english: The study of BI-01 shows that the new viscosity inhibitor has good performance.
sentences.chinese: 考察结果表明，该减粘剂具有较好的减粘效果。

sentences.english: Obviously, if the balance of pleasure over pain is positive, that's better than zero.
sentences.chinese: 显然如果快乐减痛苦是正的，即比零大。

sentences.english: I am also in the store down so, that is good.
sentences.chinese: 我也是在那个店里减得，觉得是不错。

sentences.english: But its impact on Chinese science and technology should not diminish.
sentences.chinese: 但求是科技基金会在中国科技界的影响力绝不减褪。

sentences.english: I'd say a solid B minus.
sentences.chinese: 我会给你一个实实在在的B减。

sentences.english: The canine PBRSOLT is an ideal animal experiment model.
sentences.chinese: 犬是背驮式减体积肝移植理想的动物实验模型。

sentences.english: Every time I go to WalMart I see someone at that weight.
sentences.chinese: 一旦减了重，他应该很帅才是。

sentences.english: Simple math tool to practice add, subtra - Simple math tool to practice add, subtract, multiply, and divide.
sentences.chinese: 简单的数学工具用来执行加，减，乘，除运算。

sentences.english: Old mood with day, far to letters every two years.
sentences.chinese: 老去心情随日减，远来书信隔年间。

definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
to lose weight (intentionally)/to slim down/(Tw) to downsize (a business)
to reduce/to lessen (pain etc)/to deduct (from taxes)
